page.title: 16 SHOPS
page.content: In Marshchapel there are five shops. There is a{SPAR shop},a{FISH & CHIP {shop},a{BUTCHERS shop}and 2 general stores,namely{Corner Shop}and{Sowbys}. The{SPAR shop}is a general store,a Post Office and an Off-Licence. The{FISH&CHIP shop}has closed down and been sold and in the near future it will be a{Chinese Takeaway}. The{BUTCHERS shop}sells meat and is not an abbatoir. The{Corner Shop}is a small general store which is open Tuesday to Sunday. { Sowbys}is a bigger general store than the{Corner Shop}and is not open on Wednesday afternoons and Sunday.
